Class GameSurfaceView

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.view.View
      • android.view.SurfaceView
        • at.ac.tuwien.pointnerreisinger.ballonbote.GameSurfaceView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.graphics.drawable.Drawable.Callback, android.view.accessibility.AccessibilityEventSource, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback, android.view.SurfaceHolder.Callback

    public class GameSurfaceView
extends android.view.SurfaceView
implements android.view.SurfaceHolder.Callback
    Provides the canvas for the game
    Author:
    Michael Pointner
